Posts.Content: Sep 29, 2012 08:21PM janicez wrote: Yes I'm having reconstruction at a later date. Expanders for now. I have an appt at the end of Oct with the radiation onc to see if I still will need radiation. Oh and I have invasive lobular carcinoma.
Posts.Title: October 2012 Surgery? Leigh22 ConnieGreene

Posts.Content: Sep 29, 2012 07:22PM janicez wrote: I'm having my mastectomy on Oct 2. Getting nervous. I was diagnosed in Feb and was told the way to go was chemo to shrink the cancer and then a lumpectomy. Had six rounds of chemo and two lumpectomies in august only to be told I would need a mastectomy. I decided on the double because I don't think l Could do this again.
